Text: hi thanks do you know how to get mods working with this?

Has anybody had trouble with .net framwork when trying to install this? win7 has version 3.5 by default, but it's saying I don't have it. Uninstalling it and installing a new copy doesn't work either. Suggestions?

@Syreus  Try to install .net framework 4.

@lukegoodman2001  What mods? Give a link and i'll tell you. If you mean custom maps you just need to put then into Portal2\portal2\maps and load them trough console.

Works just fine you just have backup the SAVES folder which is in Portal 2Portal2 folder
